sentences.en: A lot of customers have approaced us to enquire for mohair sweaters.
sentences.cn: 许多客户向我们询购马海毛毛衣.

sentences.en: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
sentences.cn: 你们无论进那一城，那一村，要打听那里谁是好人，就住在他家，直住到走的时候。

sentences.en: Day and day I take pains to enquire myself my reason for doing so, in no time will I stoop so low as to beg you sympathy, though I can feel your scoff all the time.
sentences.cn: 日复一日，我不厌其详地询问我自己，我在任何时候都这样低俯恳求你同情，但我能感受到你对这一切一切嗤之以鼻。

sentences.en: Did he enquire about me?
sentences.cn: 他问起过我 吗 ?

sentences.en: He will enquire about the damages after the investigation.
sentences.cn: 调查之后,他将会查询损坏情况.

sentences.en: I am writing to confirm /enquire/inform you…
sentences.cn: 我写信是要确认/询问/通知你…

sentences.en: I called the station to enquire about train times.
sentences.cn: 我打电话到车站询问火车时刻。

sentences.en: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.cn: 我最近给一个网站发邮件去询问为什么我订购的商品还没有到达。

sentences.en: If you dare to enquire into Nature, try to discover her laws.
sentences.cn: 你们要是敢于对大自然刨根问底, 就去设法揭示它的规律吧.

sentences.en: Intending visitors should enquire of us for precise directions.
sentences.cn: 有意的访客应向我们了解准确的指示说明.

sentences.en: Jim wants to enquire about purchasing new computers for his business.
sentences.cn: 吉姆想就为生意购买新电脑咨询一下情况.

sentences.en: May I enquire the nature of your company's products?
sentences.cn: 贵公司是生产什么样的产品 呢 ?

sentences.en: Please enquire within or visit us at our website.
sentences.cn: 请详见店内海报,或登陆我们的网站.

sentences.en: She wrote to enquire the cause of the delay.
sentences.cn: 她只得写信去询问拖延的理由.

sentences.en: The police said they would enquire into the letter.
sentences.cn: 警察说过,他们会调查该信件.

sentences.en: They enquire closely into the merits of the case.
sentences.cn: 他们仔细调查了事情的是非曲直.

sentences.en: They neglected to enquire whether these Methods: Were possible or practicable.
sentences.cn: 他们不去问问这些方法是否办得到,是否行得通.

sentences.en: We have obtained your company information from china. alibaba. com. So we are Emailing you to enquire whether you would be willing to establish new business relations with us.
sentences.cn: 我们从阿里巴巴网站上得到贵公司资讯。我们传送此封邮件给您是想询问您是否愿意与我们建立新的业务关系。

sentences.en: We must enquire ( as to ) whether he really came.
sentences.cn: 我们得打听一下,他是不是真的来过.

sentences.en: We will enquire into the matter.
sentences.cn: 我们将调查这事.

trans.tran_cn: 打听， 询问； 调查， 查问
